Survey Deletion Coverage

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact-us/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”21px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#000000″ button_border_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”Overpass|700|||||||” button_icon=”||fa||900″ button_on_hover=”off” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”11px|46px|12px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#000000″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||5%||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”arrow” bottom_divider_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”80%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#222d35″ header_2_font_size=”35px” custom_margin=”0px||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.3em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Survey Deletion Coverage Q & A

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”What is Survey Coverage?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Survey Coverage insures the boundaries of your property and any loss to the owner due to boundary conflicts or any loss due to encroaching improvements that are not shown on the survey.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

NOTE: Survey Coverage does NOT insure against matters, conflicts, encroachments, etc. that are shown on the survey.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”How much does this Coverage cost?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The cost for survey deletion coverage on a residential transaction is 5% of the basic premium.

For example:

[et_pb_section global_module="50829"][/et_pb_section]

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What is required to obtain Survey Coverage?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An accurate and complete survey is needed for review. Survey must include the date, surveyor’s name, seal and RPLS number. Property owners will be required to sign an affidavit that indicates no changes to the property have been made since the date of the survey

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Why is the phrase “Shortages in Area” not deleted from the general exception?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Texas Department of Insurance prohibits title companies from insuring exact acreage.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What is the benefit of purchasing Survey Coverage?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

It protects the Buyers against errors made by the surveyor or claims by neighboring owners concerning boundaries or encroachments.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(236,236,236,0.8) 0%|rgba(236,236,236,0.8) 99%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clear2close.us/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/home-bg-scaled.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”0px||34px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”text-align:center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#222d35″ header_2_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.3em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]
